properties.title: Vegetation Optical Depth
properties.description: Dataset with variables related to Vegetation Optical Depth.

FLAGS.description:
Contains the following binary flags (2**n) with N: 
 0: No Data 
 1: Snow/Frozen 
 2: Rain/Desert 
 3: Effective temperature below 274.15 K 
 4: - 
 5: - 
 6: - 
 7: L-band not present on sensor 
 8: RFI L-band 
 9: No L-band retrieval, MPDI below 0.0001 
 10: No model convergence for L-band retrieval, SM is 0 or 1 
 11: Low quality L-band retrieval due to dense vegetation 
 12: C1-band not present on sensor 
 13: RFI C1-band 
 14: No C1-band retrieval, MPDI below 0.0001 
 15: No model convergence for C1-band retrieval, SM is 0 or 1 
 16: Low quality C1-band retrieval due to dense vegetation 
 17: C2-band not present on sensor 
 18: RFI C2-band 
 19: No C2-band retrieval, MPDI below 0.0001 
 20: No model convergence for C2-band retrieval, SM is 0 or 1 
 21: Low quality C2-band retrieval due to dense vegetation 
 22: X-band not present on sensor 
 23: RFI X-band 
 24: No X-band retrieval, MPDI below 0.0001 
 25: No model convergence for X-band retrieval, SM is 0 or 1 
 26: Low quality X-band retrieval due to dense vegetation 
 27: Ku-band not present on sensor 
 28: RFI Ku-band 
 29: No Ku-band retrieval, MPDI below 0.0001 
 30: No model convergence for Ku-band retrieval, SM is 0 or 1 
 31: Low quality Ku-band retrieval due to dense vegetation

 0: No Data
